description.p1: Welcome, my name is Vicente Javier Gonz√°lez Llobet and I am a computer engineer since 2016 by the Universitat Jaume I.
description.p2: I'm specialized in web development as a full stack developer. However, I like to expand my limits constantly. An example of this is the Master in Intelligent Systems achieved at the Universitat Jaume I in 2017.
description.p3: At work I like to escape from my comfort zones always betting on new technologies, methodologies and patterns within software engineering. My main premise is that each day is a new challenge and in this way improve as a professional.
